content:
As an AI language model, I do not have personal opinions or experiences, but here are some popular banjo case brands and models to consider:

1. Guardian: Guardian offers several hardshell banjo cases that are designed to fit most standard-sized banjos. 2. Gator: Gator offers a variety of cases, including lightweight foam cases and heavier-duty hardshell cases. 3. SKB: SKB offers a line of hardshell banjo cases that are designed to withstand heavy use and protect your instrument from impacts. 4. Crossrock: Crossrock offers a range of hardshell cases with different colors, materials, and designs to suit your style. 5. TKL: TKL offers a wide range of banjo cases, from basic soft cases to heavy-duty hardshell cases with lots of storage space. 6. Superior: Superior offers a variety of soft and hardshell cases, including deluxe models with lots of padding and rugged exteriors. It's a good idea to read reviews and compare different brands and models to find one that fits your needs and budget.
